description: Used to treat pain and reduce fever.
warning: Do not exceed the recommended dose. Overdose can cause serious liver damage.

description: Provides stronger pain relief than standard paracetamol.
warning: Contains caffeine. Avoid drinking too much coffee or tea when taking this medicine.

description: Used to relieve pain, swelling, and inflammation.
warning: Do not take if you have a history of stomach ulcers or bleeding.

description: Used to reduce pain, fever, and inflammation. Also used to prevent blood clots.
warning: Do not give to children or teenagers with flu-like symptoms, as it can cause a serious condition called Reye's syndrome.

description: A penicillin-type antibiotic used to treat a wide variety of bacterial infections.
warning: Do not take if you are allergic to penicillin. Complete the full course of treatment.

description: An antibiotic used to treat different types of bacterial infections.
warning: May cause tendon swelling or tearing, especially in older adults.

description: Used to lower cholesterol and triglycerides in the blood.
warning: Avoid eating foods high in fat or cholesterol. Do not take if you are pregnant.

description: An antidepressant used to treat depression, obsessive-compulsive disorder (OCD), and anxiety disorders.
warning: May increase suicidal thoughts or actions in some children, teenagers, or young adults.

description: Used to control high blood sugar in people with type 2 diabetes.
warning: Take with a meal to reduce stomach upset. Stop taking and call your doctor if you have signs of lactic acidosis.

description: An antihistamine used to relieve symptoms of allergy, hay fever, and the common cold.
warning: May cause marked drowsiness. Avoid alcoholic drinks and be careful when driving or operating machinery.
